name: Pool Billiards Hot Snooker
description:
Pool Billiards Hot Snooker is a billiard game created by billiards lovers. We have tried to combine game with real billiards world. This is a classic 8 ball game (also support 9 ball). The Pool Billiards Hot Snooker is the only one that contains standard Pocket billiards game Eight-ball & trick shot (such as curve ball). We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation.

[ Features ]
- Incredibly easy control, feels like playing the real billiards
- You can send voice messages or text messages to another player
- Online play, player with worldwide friends
- Player with bot in single mode
- More than 60 levels are provided in Arcade mode
- 3D game graphics

If you are a snooker fan you won't miss this awesome pool billiards game.
